wishlist.name: New Balance 530
wishlist.description: The 530 blends Y2K running style with modern everyday wear. Featuring a segmented ABZORB midsole and mesh-synthetic upper with bold curves, it delivers comfort and a standout, tech-inspired look.

wishlist.name: AIR RIFT
wishlist.description: Feel barefoot with the comfort of a shoe. Featuring a split-toe design, smooth leather upper, and adjustable straps for a custom fit. Nike Air cushioning and rugged rubber outsole deliver all-day comfort and traction. Inspired by the 1996 original.

wishlist.name: Dingyun Zhang Samba
wishlist.description: Dingyun Zhang Samba Iconic shoes blend timeless style with lasting function. Born as 1950s indoor football trainers, they’ve evolved into cultural icons. With a smooth leather upper, reinforced toe, and grippy rubber sole, they’re ready for the streets or the dance floor. Step into 70 years of legacy—and make it your own.

wishlist.name: Nike Revolution 8
wishlist.description: The Revolution 8 upgrades your go-to runner with softer strides and cooler runs. A breathable mesh upper keeps you comfortable, while the foam midsole with rocker geometry provides smooth, cushioned support every step of the way.

wishlist.name: Air Force 1
wishlist.description: Big Kids' Nike Air Force 1 Iconic style meets legendary comfort with durable leather, lightweight Air cushioning, and a grippy rubber sole—perfect for everyday streetwea

wishlist.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lugged Heel Mary Jane Platform
wishlist.description: 20th century fashion gets a modern refresh in the all-new Lugged Heel Mary Jane Platform. Buckled straps adjust for the perfect fit, while a bold, lugged platform takes your look to the next level.

wishlist.name: Men Camel Solid Loafers
wishlist.description: These classic camel loafers from LA BOTTE offer a sleek, versatile design perfect for both casual and semi-formal wear. Crafted for all-day comfort with a smooth finish and easy slip-on style, they add a touch of elegance to any outfit.

wishlist.name: MOSTRO ARCHIVE
wishlist.description: The Puma Mostro Archive in white blend surf-inspired style with a modern mesh build, featuring a unique sole, iconic formstripe, and velcro closure for a bold, standout look.

wishlist.name: Nike Revolution 8
wishlist.description: The Revolution 8 upgrades your go-to runner with softer strides and cooler runs. A breathable mesh upper keeps you comfortable, while the foam midsole with rocker geometry provides smooth, cushioned support every step of the way.

wishlist.name: CHUCK TAYLOR ALL STAR LUGGED
wishlist.description: Lugged Heel Mary Jane Platform A modern twist on 20th-century fashion, featuring a luxe leather upper, adjustable buckled straps, and a bold lugged platform for added height. OrthoLite cushioning ensures all-day comfort, finished with the iconic All Star license plate.

wishlist.name: REVOLUTION 8
wishlist.description: Nike Revolution 8 Women's Road Running Shoes Experience soft, cushioned strides with a foam midsole and flexible forefoot. The upgraded mesh upper improves breathability over the Revolution 7, keeping you cool and comfortable. Designed with flex grooves for smooth movement and touch points at the heel and tongue for easy on/off.

products.name: CHUCK TAYLOR ALL STAR LUGGED
products.description: Office-ready elegance meets sneaker-like comfort. Made with durable leather, OrthoLite cushioning, and a chunky platform heel for added height. Available in neutral and bold tones to match any outfit, finished with the iconic All Star logo on the heel.

products.name: AIR RIFT
products.description: Feel barefoot with the comfort of a shoe. Featuring a split-toe design, smooth leather upper, and adjustable straps for a custom fit. Nike Air cushioning and rugged rubber outsole deliver all-day comfort and traction. Inspired by the 1996 original.

products.name: GLIDE LOW
products.description: A retro-inspired low-top sneaker with a leather and synthetic upper for durability. Features a MemoryTech OrthoLite® sockliner, shock-absorbing EVA midsole, and rubber outsole for comfort and grip. Bold green accents and a clean silhouette make it perfect for everyday wear.

products.name: PALERMO VINTAGE
products.description: A retro-inspired low-top sneaker with a leather and synthetic upper for durability. Features a MemoryTech OrthoLite® sockliner, shock-absorbing EVA midsole, and rubber outsole for comfort and grip. Bold green accents and a clean silhouette make it perfect for everyday wear.

products.name: US6-S GEL-KINETIC FLUENT
products.description: Designed by Kiko Kostadinov Studio and ASICS SportStyle, this sneaker draws from soccer spikes and grotto-inspired aesthetics. It features a two-tone mesh upper with welded details, FF BLAST™ PLUS cushioning, and scutoid GEL® tech for enhanced comfort and impact absorption. Artful, technical, and performance-driven.

products.description: Designed by Kiko Kostadinov Studio and ASICS SportStyle, this sneaker draws from soccer spikes and grotto-inspired aesthetics. products.name: Men Tan Solid Derby Brogue Formal Shoes
products.description: Made from genuine leather with a durable TPR sole. Includes a 30-day brand warranty. Easy 15-day returns. . Made in India by Pious Fashion Pvt. Ltd. Clean with branded leather conditioner.

products.description: Step out in style with these sleek white sneakers from Liberty’s Leap7x range. Designed for everyday comfort and casual wear, they feature a clean, versatile look that pairs effortlessly with any outfit. Ideal for daily use, outings, or casual gatherings.

products.name: White Velcro Uniform School Shoes For Kids SCHLPRO-3 By Liberty
products.description: Designed for comfort and durability, these white school shoes from Liberty's Leap7x range feature an easy Velcro closure for a secure fit. Perfect for everyday school wear, they offer a clean, classic look with lasting support for growing feet.
